Title: Highway Robbery
Writer: Craig Johnson (based upon the "Walt Longmire Mysteries" book series by), Hunt Baldwin (developed for television by), John Coveny (developed for television by), Hunt Baldwin, John Coveny
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Cassidy Freeman
Plot: A highway robbery which leaves one person dead and another barely alive, sets off an investigation involving a string of robberies. Henry begins taking steps in bringing justice to Gabriela's attackers.
